 Detect and mask pixels that are saturated (in the A/D converter or have excessive non-linear response) in the Chunk Exposure.

Detailed Description

Implementation of the templated subStage, Saturation Correction for Chunk Exposure, of the Instrument Signature Removal stage for the nightly LSST Image Processing Pipeline.

Author:
Nicole M. Silvestri, University of Washington

template<typename ImageT, typename MaskT>
lsst::afw::image::Exposure<ImageT, MaskT> saturationCorrectionForChunkExposure ( lsst::afw::image::Exposure< ImageT, MaskT > &  chunkExposure,
lsst::daf::data::DataProperty::PtrType &  chunkMetaData,
lsst::pex::policy::Policy &  policy 
) [inline]

Detect and mask pixels that are saturated (in the A/D converter or have excessive non-linear response) in the Chunk Exposure.

Grow by an additional pixel to mask charge spillover. Set appropriate bits in the Mask and Chunk Exposure and update the metadata for the Chunk Exposure.
